subject: Optimise Your Category Pages for Profit
description_text:
Category pages can make or break your conversions — but are yours set up to hit margin and inventory goals?

View in browser (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VVmhwL35H8LGW1z7w2h7T4vd2W5d86_w5D0Wy4M9V8k05jMY8W69t95C6lZ3pFW5Z8xM88cz-KVN3XpBkwTMFlKW1C70XX3wr8S6W6mDmFc8RY8zmW3B1FdG2PMkg1W6TMw3F4mVDYrW1jHqLZ5Rc3zNW74gd5F7yk2kdN6b4VjRzc0kzW4lsPn43DMsr9V5s3Fh41X--GN6BdLq3gXzYrW38cbW27J8NQDW3TDdBW2S7gHzW3-yfTX44G17sW8nVxfW97ts6cW71Frcd3KFm9-W3J8yCt4zH7cgW4DdjGy8n3SkLW7rstPb769XrrW1j-p7G8pcZkjW51r20C6mgzBHW2t0F0J7nqdKmN76P6ZqFTHRRW7X6bFQ5vttHDW6J2tNZ23gH-2W81RFZT4sTxpVW2rGbR98hwdcKW4r-nXN1n30-TW2-JYqw7Y-LFgMNV5HvWh4vyW7pR_Nl28mpvcW19z6lg26KnvDW71c9pv3X85XmVSGvs81qjMWqW5rXT9b17v5Rzf7Dz6-W04 )

Hey Atto,

Category pages can make or break your conversions — but are yours set up to hit margin and inventory goals?

On Oct 2 at 10am, join us for How to Optimise Category Pages by Margin, Inventory & Conversion Rate. Learn how to apply smarter merchandising rules that automatically adapt to your business goals.

?
